options.name: Etiquette Training
options.description: Gain +1 skill with persuasion. When you only know a language at a basic level, you do not suffer the penalty dice to social checks while using it.

options.name: Action : Take Notes
options.description: After witnessing a creature use a non-basic action, reaction, or spell, you quickly record observations. For the next 10 rounds, when you make a defense or contested check against that same ability, add a single academics dice to your pool.

options.name: Reaction : Myth
options.description: In response to entering combat with an Elite or Legendary creature, but before the preparation phase, you recall everything you know about this foe and make a brief statement, rolling an academics check. If the highest tiered creature is Elite, distribute each die result to a different ally within short (10 unit) distance. If there is a Legendary creature, all allies instead receive a die equal to your highest result. Once during the encounter, when making an attack, defense, or contested roll against this creature, a recipient can add their recorded value as a bonus die to the roll. This must be declared before the result is known.

options.name: Worldly
options.description: Gain +1 skill with academics and gain +2 language points.

options.name: Grand Strategy
options.description: Gain +1 skill with logic. When you encounter an enemy you've fought before, you always act in the preparation phase at the start of combat.

options.name: Anatomy and Physiology
options.description: You have studied texts of ancient medicine. You gain +1 skill with medicine knowledge. When making a medicine check to identify a disease or diagnose a death, add an academics dice into the pool.

options.name: Master of Lore
options.description: Can identify objects by making an academics or magical knowledge check, revealing information about the object such as magical properties or a brief description of its history. Uncommon items require a check of 5; Rare 7; Epic 9, Legendary 11 and Artifact 14.

options.name: Planar Thesis
options.description: You gain +1 skill with magic knowledge. Additionally, you gain the ability to learn skills from one exotic subschool.

options.name: Spoken Word
options.description: Gain +1 skill with expression. You can perform ballads as spoken stories rather than musical performances. When you perform a ballad this way, recipients automatically benefit from two harmony effects without requiring additional performers. However, no additional harmonies can be contributed to a ballad performed as spoken word.

options.name: Daily Action : Applied Knowledge
options.description: You dedicate your concentration to recalling information you have learned to aid you. While you maintain your focus in this way, you can add a single knowledge skill dice to a skill check. However, you can only use each unique knowledge skill once during the duration of this ability.
